resource.description: Permission set on private certificate authority

properties.name: Actions
properties.description: The actions that the specified AWS service principal can use. Actions IssueCertificate, GetCertificate and ListPermissions must be provided.

type.description: The actions that the specified AWS service principal can use. Actions IssueCertificate, GetCertificate and ListPermissions must be provided.

properties.name: CertificateAuthorityArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Private Certificate Authority that grants the permission.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Private Certificate Authority that grants the permission.

properties.name: Principal
properties.description: The AWS service or identity that receives the permission. At this time, the only valid principal is acm.amazonaws.com.

type.description: The AWS service or identity that receives the permission. At this time, the only valid principal is acm.amazonaws.com.

properties.name: SourceAccount
properties.description: The ID of the calling account.

type.description: The ID of the calling account.
